name: treeclim
body:
### Installation

#### Install stable version from CRAN

```R
install.packages("treeclim")
```

#### Install development version from GitHub

```R
devtools::install_github("cszang/treeclim")
```

### Citation
Zang, C., & Biondi, F. (2015). treeclim: an R package for the numerical calibration of proxy-climate relationships. Ecography, 38, 431â€“436. http://doi.org/10.1111/ecog.01335
